reviewText:
This game in 5min
https://youtu.be/nPhkAbLrinc

its ok if your into the simple tablet games.
you just drag colored worms around to get them to eat fruit of the same color but they can't cross objects, other worm, or fruit they don't like.
you win when you eat the color & quantity of fruit show in a box in the upper left.
every now and then a new worm will be introduced with a new ability like passing through obstacles, removing adjacent fruit to ones they eat, eating fruit of any color, and many more.
they activate when they have eaten enough fruit and then they will glow when active also the game will say X is ready".
the last board on each area is a music clicky game based on music and an instrument from that region.
all you need to do is click the notes when they enter the area in the middle
date: once you have enough points you win."

reviewText:
I was expecting bad rats style shovelware but the game is actually quite enjoyable.
A puzzle game where you drag snakes(?) to eat fruit. But unlike the game 'snake' you are not trying to avoid bumping into walls. Instead you are trying to eat as much fruit as possible and as quickly as possible to gain a high score for the stages.

And then the game turns into ♥♥♥♥ing DDR!

Does bad rats have DDR mode? No, no it does not.

reviewText: This game is just... so weird. Not very good at all. But fascinating in a way. reviewText:
Yumsters 2: Around the World is the unofficial spiritual successor to Bad Rats.
Featuring a similar production quality and budget as Bad Rats, Yumsters 2 pulls no punches in providing the best that indie games have to offer.
The gameplay revolves around pulling brightly-coloured dinosaur worm things (Yumsters) across chains of fruits (at a blistering 60 FPS). They eat the fruits, and you get money for it. Later on, you use the Yum-money (the yummey) to purchase a generic albeit not racist musical instrument from whatever region of the world you're in (Egypt, Mexico, Japan etc) which you then use to play a rhythm minigame that rivals the depth and complexity of titles such as DmC: Devil May Cry and Michael Jackson: The Game. The intricate plot of Yumsters 2 is very well-paced, engrossing the player in a profound tale about brotherhood and personal growth as they advance from level to level.
Yumsters 2 offers a plethora of graphical options to make it perform well on all systems, such as Fullscreen: on or off". The soundtrack of Yumsters 2 is also very prodigious
date: featuring a whopping three minutes of looping audio. Sometimes if you score a good enough Yumster combo (a yumbo)
hoursPlayed: congratulating the player on their Yumsters skill. Yumsters 2's voice acting is top-notch. Captivating quotes such as "Commander ready" and "Tumma" (???) are delivered magnificently
voteText: rivalling the emotional and compelling narratives of titles like Metal Gear Solid.\n"Do you think fruits can bloom even on a battlefield?"\n"In the Middle East we don't hunt foxes
helpfulPercent: we hunt Yumsters."\nIf you liked Bad Rats
votesHelpful: play this. Yumsters 2 may very well be the "Citizen Kane of video game"."

reviewText:
Nice casual game.

Yumsters 2 starts out easy but becomes more challenging before too long, and has tons of different levels and challenges for you to overcome.  Strange that the game seems to be billed as a 'match 3' game though, because it's nothing of the sort.

The aesthetic is bright and charming as well.  This game has the feel of the old Popcap and similar games from the early 2000's (like Insaniquarium for example), and it works very well.

Fun, friendly casual game.

reviewText:
Игра,для тех,кто любит паззлы,лично я не играл в нее,но я наблюдал.
Плюсы:
1) Много уровней
2) Разные виды червяков,что усложняет игру
3) Разные бонусы во время игры,для облегчения
Минусы:
1) Цена,дорогова-то,лучше купить на сайте за 20 рублей,что я и сделал
2) Даже если игра увлекает,т оне надолго,на мой взгляд,так как даже наблюдая за игрой,она однообразна
Но игра подайдет для детей и людям,которые любят паазлы,но или скачать игру из Alawar.ru or Myplaycity.ru
Оценка 7 из 10
